content.raw:
Is it confirmed that there is really no threshold for qual 1?  The phrasing in section 6.2 of the rules is: 

"If more than twenty teams *successfully complete both qualifying tasks*, the teams that completed qualifying Task 2 in the fastest time will be selected."

It's unclear what a successful completion of qual 1 is without a threshold.  It seems from the rules that there must be some metric of success in order to be considered for the top 20.  Is it possible for a team to make the top 20 using random guesses on qual 1?
content.html:
Is it confirmed that there is really no threshold for qual 1? The phrasing in section 6.2 of the rules is:

"If more than twenty teams successfully complete both qualifying tasks, the teams that completed qualifying Task 2 in the fastest time will be selected."

It's unclear what a successful completion of qual 1 is without a threshold. It seems from the rules that there must be some metric of success in order to be considered for the top 20. Is it possible for a team to make the top 20 using random guesses on qual 1?
